item.title: Re: Question!
item.content:encoded:
Where did you read that you need 19 in a stat to loop? You can loop to Season 2 as soon as you hit 18 in one stat, but once a stat hits 20, your loop timer starts.

…Looking at the Looping Guide here, though, it seems like it needs an update stating the above…not sure how the level you can possibly loop at scales compared to the level the loop timer starts at increases, so I'm not going to add that there.

item.title: Re: Question!
item.content:encoded: You can loop at 18, but your counter doesn't start until you hit 20.
